caption: Policy Override Audit
name: policy_audit
description: Reports user policy override activity at a management console or a managed client.

app_name.description: The name of the application that may be associated with the policy change.

app_uid.description: The identifier of the application that may be associated with the policy change.

app_ver.description: The version of the application that may be associated with the policy change.

activity_id.description: Identifies a client side initiated action and the scope of change applied (policy or rule).

file.description: The file that pertains to the policy override.

session_uid.description: The user session ID from which the override action was performed (Windows only).
